description: Cancels a pending configuration change on an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of an OpenSearch Service domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: CancelledChangeIds
nested_items.description: The unique identifiers of the changes that were cancelled.

nested_items.name: CancelledChangeProperties
nested_items.description: The domain change properties that were cancelled.

nested_items.name: PropertyName
nested_items.description: The name of the property whose change was cancelled.

nested_items.name: CancelledValue
nested_items.description: The pending value of the property that was cancelled. This would have been the eventual value of the property if the chance had not been cancelled.

nested_items.name: ActiveValue
nested_items.description: The current value of the property, after the change was cancelled.

nested_items.name: DryRun
nested_items.description: Whether or not the request was a dry run. If True, the changes were not actually cancelled.
